text:
唔、……
即使仍然很不情願，但、被對方放開後，遊戲終於伸手探向自己的私處。
那種方式、根本沒有讓人拒絕的餘地嘛……
猶豫了一下，遊戲的手還是碰上自己的下體，下一刻他卻驚呼出聲──身體被突然一推，從原先的跪姿往後跌，幸好床頭的枕頭讓他避免整個人跌躺下來。 就著枕頭靠坐在牆邊，遊戲有些驚疑不定地瞪向面前人，對方接下來的動作卻讓他更加驚慌起來。
「等、這樣──」
trans:
Uh, …
Even though very unwilling, as usually released by the other guy, Yugi finally reaches out toward his private part.
That kind of approach left no room for refusal at all…
After thinking for a moment, Yugi's hand reach toward his lower body; the next thing he knew, Yugi was howling because his body gave way, pushing him the other way, so that he eventually falls backward from his previous kneeling position. Luckily, a pillow lay behind the head of the bed, or else he would have hit the wall. He leans back against the wall, with the pillow he had brought, staring at the figure in front of him with a rather confused and alarmed countenance. But the other person's next move made him even more frightened.
“Wait, so—”
